english.segment1: The morning finds me here at heaven's door. A place I've been so many times before. Familiar thoughts and phrases start to flow. And carry me to places that I know so well. But dare I go where I don't understand. And do I dare remember where I am. I stand before the great eternal throne. The one that God Himself is seated on. And I, I've been invited as a son. Oh I, I've been invited to come and
english.segment2: Believe the unbelievable. Receive the inconceivable. And see beyond my wildest imagination. Lord, I come with great expectations
english.segment3: So wake the hope that slumbers in my soul. Stir the fire inside and make it glow. I'm trusting in a love that has no end. The Savior of this world has called me friend. And I, I've been invited with the Son. Oh I, I've been invited to come and ..
english.segment4: Believe the unbelievable. Receive the inconceivable. And see beyond my wildest imagination. Lord, I come with great expectations
english.segment5: We've been invited with the Son. And we've been invited to come and
english.segment6: Believe the unbelievable. Receive the inconceivable. And see beyond our wildest imagination. Lord, we come to
english.segment7: Believe the unbelievable. Receive the inconceivable. And see beyond my wildest imagination. Lord, I come with great expectations.
